text:
Asad Qaiser (; born 15 November 1969) is a Pakistani politician. He is the current Speaker of the National Assembly of Pakistan, in office since August 2018. He has been a member of the National Assembly of Pakistan, since August 2018.
In April 2020, Qaiser tested positive for COVID-19 during the coronavirus pandemic in Pakistan.

annotations.surface_form: Speaker of the National Assembly of Pakistan
